data.title: Stevenson Athletics History
data.meta_site_name: Stevenson School - Day & Boarding School in Monterey Peninsula, CA
data.text:
The Athlete of the Year is awarded to two athletes who represent the best in athletics at Stevenson School. They recognize students who have demonstrated outstanding athletic ability, and leadership qualities that have made their teams stronger than the sum of their parts, and produced a consistently high level of performance during the current academic year.

The Robert F. Ford Sportsmanship Award is a prestigious athletic honor presented to two athletes who have demonstrated outstanding sportsmanship. Selected by the Stevenson School coaches, the Sportsmanship Award is presented to the student who best demonstrates the qualities of citizenship, enthusiasm, fair play, and dedication to their teams and sports. Awardees consistently invest their best effort and use mature judgment, even under the most adverse circumstances.
